booking.title: Book a session
booking.description: Booking a session works in mornings or afternoons, because I don't care if it takes 3 minutes or 3 hours, you won't leave until you're happy with the results!
booking.mobileDescription: Book my session at Studio Maison M

instructions.day: First of all choose your day

hourStep.instruction: Select the schedule that suits you best

contactStep.title: One last thing...
contactStep.instruction: We need your e-mail to complete your booking

bookingCompleteStep.title: One last thing...
bookingCompleteStep.instruction: You will receive a confirmation email from us in a few days to confirm your booking. Don't miss it !

faq.title: FAQ
faq.question1: I don't know what my project needs, can I still book a session?
faq.answer1: Yes absolutely! After completing the forms in the "Book A Session" tab you'll get an email where we can have a chat to figure out what you want out of the session and go from there!
faq.question2: Can we record a whole band at the same time?
faq.answer2: Yes you can! The studio is equipped with drums, piano and guitar amps, so you'll be able to record everything at once if you want!
faq.question3: Is this only a recording studio?
faq.answer3: Nope. It can be used as a rehearsal space for future live shows, as a mixing/arrangement studio or to shoot some video clips for media content if you wish (I recommend the couch for podcasts!!)

gear.title: Gear
gear.description: Here you can select some microphones or instruments you want to use for your session or if you're curious about how they sound. Don't worry if you don't know I'll pick the right ones ;)

remoteRecording.title: Remote recording
remoteRecording.description2: allows you to work with me
remoteRecording.description4: from the comfort of your home (or from the bahamas). Just get straight in touch with me and tell me
remoteRecording.description5: what you'd like for your project :D

about.title: About
about.description: Studio Maison M was founded by non-other than the drummer Sami ROGER in 2021. After 2 years of work and testing, it opened in 2023. It is located in Bondy, close enough to Paris to be accessible but still far enough to be able to make band practice or loud music playing possible at all times. Its constant evolution and new recording gears and instruments make it the perfect place to experiment and let your ideas flow without boundaries. Get ready to find weird instruments and stuff you won't find in an ordinary recording studio. You'll feel instantly home and cosy in this well decorated studio, the home you wish you could be in forever!

booking.object: Your booking at Studio Maison M
booking.title: Your booking at Studio Maison M
booking.body: Thank you for taking the time to fill in our booking form, we'll get back to you shortly to confirm your slot! If you have any questions, don't hesitate to send us an e-mail ðŸ™‚
